about.title: Víctor de la Fuente
about.headline: About me
about.body:
A senior Front End developer.

Degree in Mathematical Sciences, who started the Computational profile and completed the Astronomy and Geodesy profile.
about.body-1:
Based on:

  • Team Leadership orientation.
  • Agile methodologies practices.
  • Project management: Planning, estimation, resources, coordination, risk management.
  • App development using frameworks, React, Angular or Vue.
  • E2E backend integration (middlewares, Salesforce, third parties).
  • Data quality.
  • Analytics, reporting and dashboarding.

Industry competence:

  • Hospitality.
  • Newspapers.
  • TV Channels.
  • Banking.
  • Booking engine.
about.body-2:
• HTML, (S)CSS, JavaScript and TypeScript languages.
  • Angular, React, Vue and Svelte web developments.
  • CI/CD automation flows.
  • Git flows.
  • Testing libraries.
about.body-3:
• OOP experience.
  • XHTML, PHP, Java, {less}, Stylus and LaTeX languages.
  • NodeJs, ViteJs, NuxtJs, NextJs, Ionic, Expo and Astro web developments.
  • npm developments.
  • App environment architectures.
  • WAI experience.
  • SEO/SEM guidelines.
